description.en: A man clad in black armor、 prisoner to wicked thoughts. In order to gain control of the Crystals、 he manipulated the Baron army from the shadows and brainwashed Kain、 causing Cecil and his allies to suffer through countless acts of cruelty. After he is freed from the evil possessing him、 Golbez atones for his actions by hewing a path for his younger brother Cecil.
description.jp:
邪悪な思念に囚われた 黒き甲冑の男。
クリスタルを奪うためにバロン軍を
裏であやつり セシルの盟友カインを
洗脳するなど 数々の卑劣な手段で
一行を苦しめた。彼自身をあやつって
いた思念から解放された後は 贖罪の
ため弟であるセシルの道を切り拓く。

jp.text: 一緒に行かせてはもらえませんか？
しばらく大人しくしていてもらおう！
この戦い 私自身が決着をつける！

gl.text: Might you permit me to accompany you?

desc.jp: 魔法攻撃\n相手のBRVを奪う攻撃

desc.jp: 自身のBRVを消費して\n相手のHPを削る攻撃

desc.en:
Dark melee BRV attack + Dark magic BRV + HP attack
Grants 1 stack of [Shadow Dragon] for 4 turns

While [Shadow Dragon] is active:
• [BRV Attack] becomes [BRV Attack+]
　∟ Dark magic BRV attack + Dark melee BRV attack by Shadow Dragon

While [Shadow Dragon II] is active:
• Becomes [Rising Wave+]
　∟ Adds a Dark melee BRV + HP attack by Shadow Dragon

While [Shadow Dragon III] is active:
• Becomes [Rising Wave++]
　∟ BRV attack hit count becomes 2 for every attack
　∟ Does not grant [Shadow Dragon]

[Shadow Dragon] raises Max BRV and Attack based on the number of stacks
desc.gl:
Dark melee BRV attack + Dark magic BRV attack + HP attack
Self: 4 turns 1 level of Shadow Dragon (limit 3)
Becomes Rising Wave+ with 2 levels of Shadow Dragon
Becomes Rising Wave++ with 3 levels of Shadow Dragon
BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ while Shadow Dragon active

闇属性近距離物理BRV攻撃
